briefTitle: Highdose Nicotine Patch Therapy for Smokeless Tobacco Use

outcomeMeasures.title: End of Treatment (Week 8) Point Prevalence Abstinence
outcomeMeasures.description: 7 day point prevalence abstinence at the end of treatment, biochemically confirmed by urinary anabasine \< 2 ng per ml

outcomeMeasures.title: Point-prevalence Abstinence at 3 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: 7 day point prevalence abstinence from tobacco at 3 months, biochemically confirmed using urinary anabasine \< 2 ng per ml

outcomeMeasures.title: Point-prevalence Abstinence at 6 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: 7 day point prevalence abstinence from all tobacco at 6 months, biochemically confirmed using urinary anabasine \< 2 ng per ml.
